programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Yolanda and Kyle are apprehensive about dropping their daughters off at college; Lisa Rinna shoots a movie with her husband, Harry Hamlin, and magician, Penn Jillette; Brandi checks out her ex-husband's new TV reality show.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The women visit a spa in Santa Barbara, Calif., but the afternoon turns tense; Eileen invites everyone to her Malibu home for a night of poker; Kim's erratic behavior puts everyone on edge, leading to a confrontation between Brandi and Kyle.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Kyle and Brandi argue over Kim in the wake of Eileen's poker party; Lisa Vanderpump's dog, Rumpy, returns from puppy training camp; Lisa Rinna hosts a jewelry party, where Brandi gets called out over her recent behavior.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Lisa Vanderpump's adopted son, Max, decides he wants to take a DNA test to discover his heritage; Brandi and Kyle trade accusations while visiting Kim; Brandi shows up uninvited to Kyle's gay mixer where insults are exchanged.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: After the blow up at Kyle's gay mixer, the women discuss Brandi's influence over Kim; Lisa Vanderpump is nervous when her son receives his genealogy test results; the women attend Eileen's movie premiere at a suburban shopping center.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Eileen organizes a table-read for her husband's latest Hollywood script, and emotions run high; Brandi agrees to a 21-day cleanse but attending Lisa Vanderpump's surprise birthday party causes her to second-guess her decision to stay sober.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The women are forced to set aside their differences and work together as teams while taking part in Yolanda's scavenger hunt; the women embark on a group trip to Amsterdam; at a charity gala, Kim reproaches Lisa Rinna for talking behind her back.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Kim and Lisa Rinna continue to aggravate each other, culminating in an explosive dinner that causes Kyle to flee the scene; the women enjoy the local space cakes, but the fun sours when Brandi blows up at Kyle.

programme.desc: Aviva hosts a charity event, but Ramona and Sonja don't show; Aviva tells Carole she is afraid of flying.

programme.desc: After Kenya's deal with Phaedra's video goes sour, she decides to produce her own, and Phaedra retaliates; NeNe returns to Atlanta; Phaedra and Kenya's feud takes the stage at Cynthia's charity event.

programme.desc: Cynthia reluctantly lets Kenya help with her Miss Renaissance pageant; Phaedra, Apollo, Kandi and Todd have dinner together; Kandi prepares for her duet.

programme.desc: The ladies are Los Angeles bound; NeNe's temper explodes.

programme.desc: Porsha waits until she's with Kordell to take a pregnancy test; NeNe travels to New York to promote her sitcom; renovations have Kandi stressed.
